experience.role: Independent Researcher - Consumer Psychology & Retail Layouts
experience.description: Conducted observational research on the impact of store geography and aisle placement on customer decision-making processes. Analyzed key performance indicators that drive conversion rates in high-traffic retail environments.

experience.role: Lead Student Researcher - Retail Market Trends
experience.description: Investigated the correlation between personalized sales interactions and brand loyalty. Compiled detailed reports on competitive pricing strategies and seasonal merchandising techniques within the local retail sector.
